name: Long Nails 3D
description:
Are you ready to nail the best long nails game EVER created? Be a baddie with beautiful nails and have the best fun of your life.

Make your nails longer by collecting them. Slide down the nail file poles! There are obstacles on the way, watch out! Do a headstand and use your nails like legs and pass the pools. At the end of the level pop them nail polish bottles and get extra coins!

It’s time to shine queen, show them your nails, and IMPRESS!
publishers: Rollic Games Oyun Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
